  # Copy the plugin in the _vendor/plugin_ directory
  # Create a file named _simplyglobal.rb_ in the _config/initializers_ directory
  # In _simplyglobal.rb_, create a `hashes` of language
{{{
# français
fr = {
    "hi" => "bonjour",
    "welcome" => "bienvenue"  
}

# espanol
es = {
    "hi" => "hola",
    "welcome" => "bienvenida"
}
}}}
  # Add the language `hashes` to the object
{{{
SimplyGlobal.add_language_hash(:fr, fr)
SimplyGlobal.add_language_hash(:es, es)
}}}

You will end up with a file named _simplyglobal.rb_ that looks like this :
{{{
# français
fr = {
    "hi" => "bonjour",
    "welcome" => "bienvenue"  
}

# espanol
es = {
    "hi" => "hola",
    "welcome" => "bienvenida"
}

SimplyGlobal.add_language_hash(:fr, fr)
SimplyGlobal.add_language_hash(:es, es)
}}}
